page.title: 11Religion in our area.
page.content: Congregations in the Welsh Nonconformist Chapels have diminished in latter years.Tabernacl,the Welsh Independant chapel in Gowerton shares a minister with 2 Swansea chapels; Bethania and Bethel have no minister at all.One united Sunday School is held for these three chapels.Although this is true for the Loughor area too, the future might be brighter with the new generation of Welsh speakers.A Gymanfa Undebol-A Festival of Praises is held annually. Loughor became famous at the beginning of this century with Evan Roberts beginning his ministry at Moriah chapel in 1904.Such was the effect of his preaching,over 32,000 people joined the churches by the end of that year.The social effects were many,drunkards and theives mended their ways,families were happy again.
